name: SD-17 Homing Missile
Lore: 'Originally developed by smugglers and pirates as defense against starfighters. Adapted by the Empire to serve as onboard defense for slow moving bombers.',
Text: 'Deploy on Boba Fett, Jodo Kast, or your character with a Jet Pack. May place this weapon in Used Pile to target a character or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Character lost if destiny -1 > defense value. Vehicle hit if destiny +2 > defense value.(Original concept by Nate Albright - PC Volunteer Award 2007)',
